message.body: Dollar's shoe is back on but he's still off - pretty ok at the walk, off at trot. I'll give him 1g bute, think I should keep soaking?
Sorry,I was driving. Disk 2 more days then let new know how he is,and Bute too,thanks
Ok, think I should poultice & wrap it up still too?
I can soak tomorrow but can't make it out Wednesday, can you? If not I'll ask Brenna
